section.name: About RooMeeting
section.p:
RooMeeting is a 100% free, 100% open source application, under Apache 2 License.
It is developed with some of the most powerful J2EE frameworks (Twitter Bootstrap, Tapestry 5, Spring 3, JPA 2/Hibernate 4), the whole thing pre-bundled in a Tomcat 7 server.
It can be deployed easily on the cloud, depending on your requirements.
